text: The Lady from Trévelez (Spanish:La señorita de Trevélez) may refer to: * The Lady from Trévelez (play), a 1916 play by Carlos Arniches * The Lady from Trévelez (film), a 1935 film directed by Edgar Neville ==See also== * Calle Mayor (1956), another adaptation of the play
title: The Lady from Trévelez
